Type.Name: TriggerActionFunction

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TriggerActionFunction(string msg, string level, string[] supinfo);
.class public auto ansi sealed TriggerActionFunction extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.param: The human-readable message that was passed to . May be null.
The severity level of the event. May be null.
The section in which the event belongs.
Docs.summary: Can be used as a target for of instances.
